Text: Love all your stuff, just great job! One favor, you had a Bear Garden album awhile back- one of the songs called "Lounge" was cut off in the middle. Any chance you'd upload that again complete?

Absolutely first class. Thank you.
Be well. T.

Another fabulous compilation.
Thanks once again.
Cheers.

I think that's the bonus track which is not on the LP. The source is probably a 7'' single and could be tricky to locate in my collection. I won't promise you but if I find it, I'll upload the whole record.

dragonbandit314 and r.trifun thanks for taking the time and commenting on my uploads.
Thanks so much! Just love that song when I'm driving.

The Staff... FINALLY! I have this album but it's a crackle & popfest and my best efforts to clean it up weren't very successful. THANK YOU once again for bringing this (and many others) back from the dead!
